headline: Is Masco Attractively Priced After 10% Slide Amid Housing Demand Uncertainty?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Masco is a bargain or a value trap at around $64 a share, you are not alone. This article is going to walk through what the numbers actually say. Despite being down about 10.1% year to date and 18.4% over the last year, the stock has still delivered a solid 37.0% gain over three years. This tells you sentiment around Masco can shift quickly when conditions line up. Recent moves have been shaped by shifting expectations around US housing and renovation...
